contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} [[File:Koyu District in Miyazaki Prefecture.png|thumb|250px]] {{nihongo|'''Koyu'''|児湯郡|Koyu-gun}} is a [[districts of Japan|district]] located in [[Miyazaki Prefecture|Miyazaki]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the district has an estimated [[population]] of 78,392 and the [[population density|density]] of 109.52 persons per km². The total area is 715.80 km². ==Towns and villages== *[[Kawaminami, Miyazaki|Kawaminami]] *[[Kijō, Miyazaki|Kijō]] *[[Nishimera, Miyazaki|Nishimera]] *[[Shintomi, Miyazaki|Shintomi]] *[[Takanabe, Miyazaki|Takanabe]] *[[Tsuno, Miyazaki|Tsuno]] {{Miyazaki}} {{coord|32.249|N|131.483|E|type:landmark_source:itwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Districts in Miyazaki Prefecture]] {{Miyazaki-geo-stub}}
